skills.effect: If unit's HP ≥ 90% in combat against a blue tome user, unit makes a follow-up attack and foe cannot.

skills.name: B Tomebreaker 2
skills.effect: If unit's HP ≥ 70% in combat against a blue tome user, unit makes a follow-up attack and foe cannot.

skills.name: B Tomebreaker 3
skills.effect: If unit's HP ≥ 50% in combat against a blue tome user, unit makes a follow-up attack and foe cannot.

skills.name: Bowbreaker 1
skills.effect: If unit's HP ≥ 90% in combat against a bow user, unit makes a follow-up attack and foe cannot.

skills.name: Bowbreaker 2
skills.effect: If unit's HP ≥ 70% in combat against a bow user, unit makes a follow-up attack and foe cannot.

skills.name: Bowbreaker 3
skills.effect: If unit's HP ≥ 50% in combat against a bow user, unit makes a follow-up attack and foe cannot.

skills.name: Brash Assault 1
skills.effect: Unit automatically makes a follow-up when at HP ≤ 30% and attacking a foe that can counter.

skills.name: Brash Assault 2
skills.effect: Unit automatically makes a follow-up when at HP ≤ 40% and attacking a foe that can counter.

skills.name: Brash Assault 3
skills.effect: Unit automatically makes a follow-up when at HP ≤ 50% and attacking a foe that can counter.

skills.name: Daggerbreaker 1
skills.effect: If unit's HP ≥ 90% in combat against a dagger user, unit makes a follow-up attack and foe cannot.

skills.name: Daggerbreaker 2
skills.effect: If unit's HP ≥ 70% in combat against a dagger user, unit makes a follow-up attack and foe cannot.

skills.name: Daggerbreaker 3
skills.effect: If unit's HP ≥ 50% in combat against a dagger user, unit makes a follow-up attack and foe cannot.

skills.name: Desperation 1
skills.effect: If unit initiates combat with HP ≤ 25%, follow-up attacks occur immediately after unit's attack.

skills.name: Desperation 2
skills.effect: If unit initiates combat with HP ≤ 50%, follow-up attacks occur immediately after unit's attack.

skills.name: Desperation 3
skills.effect: If unit initiates combat with HP ≤ 75%, follow-up attacks occur immediately after unit's attack.

skills.name: Drag Back
skills.effect: If unit initiates attack, the unit moves 1 space away after combat. Foe moves into unit's previous space.

skills.name: Escape Route 1
skills.effect: Enables unit whose own HP is ≤ 30% to warp adjacent to any ally.

skills.name: Escape Route 2
skills.effect: Enables unit whose own HP is ≤ 40% to warp adjacent to any ally.

skills.name: Escape Route 3
skills.effect: Enables unit whose own HP is ≤ 50% to warp adjacent to any ally.

skills.name: G Tomebreaker 1
skills.effect: If unit's HP ≥ 90% in combat against a green tome user, unit makes a follow-up attack and foe cannot.

skills.name: G Tomebreaker 2
skills.effect: If unit's HP ≥ 70% in combat against a green tome user, unit makes a follow-up attack and foe cannot.

skills.name: G Tomebreaker 3
skills.effect: If unit's HP ≥ 50% in combat against a green tome user, unit makes a follow-up attack and foe cannot.

skills.name: Knock Back
skills.effect: If unit initiates attack, foe is moved 1 space away after combat.

skills.name: Lancebreaker 1
skills.effect: If unit's HP ≥ 90% in combat against a lance user, unit makes a follow-up attack and foe cannot.

skills.name: Lancebreaker 2
skills.effect: If unit's HP ≥ 70% in combat against a lance user, unit makes a follow-up attack and foe cannot.

skills.name: Lancebreaker 3
skills.effect: If unit's HP ≥ 50% in combat against a lance user, unit makes a follow-up attack and foe cannot.

skills.name: Live for Bounty
skills.effect: If unit survives, get 1.5x normal badges from a Training Tower map. (If similar skill effects also used, only highest multiplier applied.)

skills.name: Live for Honor
skills.effect: If unit survives, get 1.5x normal badges from a Training Tower map. (If similar skill effects also used, only highest multiplier applied.)

skills.name: Live to Serve 1
skills.effect: When healing allies with a staff, unit also recovers 50% of the HP restored.

skills.name: Live to Serve 2
skills.effect: When healing allies with a staff, unit also recovers 75% of the HP restored.

skills.name: Live to Serve 3
skills.effect: When healing allies with a staff, unit also recovers the same amount.

skills.name: Lunge
skills.effect: If unit initiates attack, after combat, unit and targeted foe swap places.

skills.name: Obstruct 1
skills.effect: Prevents foes from moving through adjacent spaces while this unit's HP ≥ 90%. (No effect on foes with a Pass skill.)

skills.name: Obstruct 2
skills.effect: Prevents foes from moving through adjacent spaces while this unit's HP ≥ 70%. (No effect on foes with a Pass skill.)

skills.name: Obstruct 3
skills.effect: Prevents foes from moving through adjacent spaces while this unit's HP ≥ 50%. (No effect on foes with a Pass skill.)

skills.name: Pass 1
skills.effect: Units can pass through foes if its own HP ≥ 75%.

skills.name: Pass 2
skills.effect: Units can pass through foes if its own HP ≥ 50%.

skills.name: Pass 3
skills.effect: Units can pass through foes if its own HP ≥ 25%.

skills.name: Poison Strike 1
skills.effect: Inflicts 4 damage to foe after any combat this unit initiates.

skills.name: Poison Strike 2
skills.effect: Inflicts 7 damage to foe after any combat this unit initiates.

skills.name: Poison Strike 3
skills.effect: Inflicts 10 damage to foe after any combat this unit initiates.

skills.name: Quick Riposte 1
skills.effect: Unit automatically makes a follow-up attack if attacked at HP ≥ 90%.

skills.name: Quick Riposte 2
skills.effect: Unit automatically makes a follow-up attack if attacked at HP ≥ 80%.

skills.name: Quick Riposte 3
skills.effect: Unit automatically makes a follow-up attack if attacked at HP ≥ 70%.

skills.name: R Tomebreaker 1
skills.effect: If unit's HP ≥ 90% in combat against a red tome user, unit makes a follow-up attack and foe cannot.

skills.name: R Tomebreaker 2
skills.effect: If unit's HP ≥ 70% in combat against a red tome user, unit makes a follow-up attack and foe cannot.

skills.name: R Tomebreaker 3
skills.effect: If unit's HP ≥ 50% in combat against a red tome user, unit makes a follow-up attack and foe cannot.

skills.name: Renewal 1
skills.effect: At the start of every fourth turn, restores 10 HP.

skills.name: Renewal 2
skills.effect: At the start of every third turn, restores 10 HP.

skills.name: Renewal 3
skills.effect: At the start of every second turn, restores 10 HP.

skills.name: Seal Atk 1
skills.effect: After combat, foe suffers Atk-3 through its next action.

skills.name: Seal Atk 2
skills.effect: After combat, foe suffers Atk-5 through its next action.

skills.name: Seal Atk 3
skills.effect: After combat, foe suffers Atk-7 through its next action.

skills.name: Seal Def 1
skills.effect: After combat, foe suffers Def-3 through its next action.

skills.name: Seal Def 2
skills.effect: After combat, foe suffers Def-5 through its next action.

skills.name: Seal Def 3
skills.effect: After combat, foe suffers Def-7 through its next action.

skills.name: Seal Res 1
skills.effect: After combat, foe suffers Res-3 through its next action.

skills.name: Seal Res 2
skills.effect: After combat, foe suffers Res-5 through its next action.

skills.name: Seal Res 3
skills.effect: After combat, foe suffers Res-7 through its next action.

skills.name: Seal Spd 1
skills.effect: After combat, foe suffers Spd-3 through its next action.

skills.name: Seal Spd 2
skills.effect: After combat, foe suffers Spd-5 through its next action.

skills.name: Seal Spd 3
skills.effect: After combat, foe suffers Spd-7 through its next action.

skills.name: Swordbreaker 1
skills.effect: If unit's HP ≥ 90% in combat against a sword user, unit makes a follow-up attack and foe cannot.

skills.name: Swordbreaker 2
skills.effect: If unit's HP ≥ 70% in combat against a sword user, unit makes a follow-up attack and foe cannot.

skills.name: Swordbreaker 3
skills.effect: If unit's HP ≥ 50% in combat against a sword user, unit makes a follow-up attack and foe cannot.

skills.name: Vantage 1
skills.effect: Unit counterattacks first when attacked at HP ≤ 25%.

skills.name: Vantage 2
skills.effect: Unit counterattacks first when attacked at HP ≤ 50%.

skills.name: Vantage 3
skills.effect: Unit counterattacks first when attacked at HP ≤ 75%.

skills.name: Wary Fighter 1
skills.effect: Prevents follow-up attacks in combat from unit and foes if unit's HP ≥ 90%.

skills.name: Wary Fighter 2
skills.effect: Prevents follow-up attacks in combat from unit and foes if unit's HP ≥ 70%.

skills.name: Wary Fighter 3
skills.effect: Prevents follow-up attacks in combat from unit and foes if unit's HP ≥ 50%.

skills.name: Wings of Mercy 1
skills.effect: Enables unit to warp adjacent to any ally with HP ≤ 30%.

skills.name: Wings of Mercy 2
skills.effect: Enables unit to warp adjacent to any ally with HP ≤ 40%.

skills.name: Wings of Mercy 3
skills.effect: Enables unit to warp adjacent to any ally with HP ≤ 50%.

skills.name: Axe Experience 1
skills.effect: If unit survives, unit gets 1.5x EXP. (If similar skill effects also used, only highest multipler applied.)

skills.name: Axe Experience 2
skills.effect: If unit survives, all axe users on team get 1.5x EXP. (If similar skill effects also used, only highest multipler applied.)

skills.name: Axe Experience 3
skills.effect: If unit survives, all axe users on team get 2x EXP. (If similar skill effects also used, only highest multipler applied.)

skills.name: Breath of Life 1
skills.effect: If unit initiates attack, adjacent allies recover 3 HP after combat.

skills.name: Breath of Life 2
skills.effect: If unit initiates attack, adjacent allies recover 5 HP after combat.

skills.name: Breath of Life 3
skills.effect: If unit initiates attack, adjacent allies recover 7 HP after combat.

skills.name: Fortify Armor
skills.effect: Grants adjacent armor allies Def/Res+6 through their next actions at the start of each turn.

skills.name: Fortify Cavalry
skills.effect: Grants adjacent cavalry allies Def/Res+6 through their next actions at the start of each turn.

skills.name: Fortify Def 1
skills.effect: Grants adjacent allies Def+2 through their next actions at the start of each turn.

skills.name: Fortify Def 2
skills.effect: Grants adjacent allies Def+3 through their next actions at the start of each turn.

skills.name: Fortify Def 3
skills.effect: Grants adjacent allies Def+4 through their next actions at the start of each turn.

skills.name: Fortify Dragons
skills.effect: Grants adjacent Dragon allies Def/Res+6 through their next actions at the start of each turn.

skills.name: Fortify Fliers
skills.effect: Grants adjacent flying allies Def/Res+6 through their next actions at the start of each turn.

skills.name: Fortify Res 1
skills.effect: Grants adjacent allies Res+2 through their next actions at the start of each turn.

skills.name: Fortify Res 2
skills.effect: Grants adjacent allies Res+3 through their next actions at the start of each turn.

skills.name: Fortify Res 3
skills.effect: Grants adjacent allies Res+4 through their next actions at the start of each turn.

skills.name: Goad Armor
skills.effect: Grants armored allies within 2 spaces Spd/Atk+4 during combat.

skills.name: Goad Cavalry
skills.effect: Grants cavalry allies within 2 spaces Spd/Atk+4 during combat.

skills.name: Goad Fliers
skills.effect: Grants flying allies within 2 spaces Spd/Atk+4 during combat.

skills.name: Hone Armor
skills.effect: Grants adjacent armored allies Atk/Spd+6 through their next actions at the start of each turn.

skills.name: Hone Atk 1
skills.effect: Grants adjacent allies Atk+2 through their next actions at the start of each turn.

skills.name: Hone Atk 2
skills.effect: Grants adjacent allies Atk+3 through their next actions at the start of each turn.

skills.name: Hone Atk 3
skills.effect: Grants adjacent allies Atk+4 through their next actions at the start of each turn.

skills.name: Hone Cavalry
skills.effect: Grants adjacent cavalry allies Atk/Spd+6 through their next actions at the start of each turn.

skills.name: Hone Fliers
skills.effect: Grants adjacent flying allies Atk/Spd+6 through their next actions at the start of each turn.

skills.effect: Grants adjacent allies Spd+2 through their next actions at the start of each turn.

skills.name: Hone Spd 2
skills.effect: Grants adjacent allies Spd+3 through their next actions at the start of each turn.

skills.name: Hone Spd 3
skills.effect: Grants adjacent allies Spd+4 through their next actions at the start of each turn.

skills.name: Savage Blow 1
skills.effect: If unit initiates attack, foes within 2 spaces of target take 3 damage after combat.

skills.name: Savage Blow 2
skills.effect: If unit initiates attack, foes within 2 spaces of target take 5 damage after combat.

skills.name: Savage Blow 3
skills.effect: If unit initiates attack, foes within 2 spaces of target take 7 damage after combat.

skills.name: Spur Atk 1
skills.effect: Grants adjacent allies Atk+2 during combat.

skills.name: Spur Atk 2
skills.effect: Grants adjacent allies Atk+3 during combat.

skills.name: Spur Atk 3
skills.effect: Grants adjacent allies Atk+4 during combat.

skills.name: Spur Def 1
skills.effect: Grants adjacent allies Def+2 during combat.

skills.name: Spur Def 2
skills.effect: Grants adjacent allies Def+3 during combat.

skills.name: Spur Def 3
skills.effect: Grants adjacent allies Def+4 during combat.

skills.effect: Grants adjacent allies Res+2 during combat.

skills.name: Spur Res 2
skills.effect: Grants adjacent allies Res+3 during combat.

skills.name: Spur Res 3
skills.effect: Grants adjacent allies Res+4 during combat.

skills.effect: Grants adjacent allies Spd+2 during combat.

skills.name: Spur Spd 2
skills.effect: Grants adjacent allies Spd+3 during combat.

skills.name: Spur Spd 3
skills.effect: Grants adjacent allies Spd+4 during combat.

skills.name: Threaten Atk 1

skills.effect: Inflicts Atk-4 on foes within 2 spaces through their next actions at the start of each turn.

skills.name: Threaten Atk 3

skills.effect: Grants armored allies within 2 spaces Def/Res+4 during combat.
